title: Highest earning eSports countries in 2018 , by prize winnings
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Prize money in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Germany.
The highest Country United States has 23.91 more Prize money in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Prize money in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Countrys.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars and Germany has the lowest Prize money in million U.S. dollars.
Country China has the second highest value for Prize money in million U.S. dollars.

The Country United States has the highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars, followed by China, and South Korea. Down to the Country Germany which is the lowest.
The average Prize money in million U.S. dollars in all 10 Countrys is 10.34.
